conclusion: Consider changes in position and size of shadows when light source moves to the right.
Object A is a cake positioned on a plate.
Shadow of the cake will move to the right when the light source moves to the right.
Size of the cake's shadow will remain the same.
Object B is a toilet paper roll positioned on the floor.
Shadow of the toilet paper roll will move to the right when the light source moves to the right.
Size of the toilet paper roll's shadow will remain the same.
Object C is a soccer ball positioned on the floor.
Shadow of the soccer ball will move to the right when the light source moves to the right.
Size of the soccer ball's shadow will remain the same.
Object D is a postcard positioned on the floor.
Shadow of the postcard will move to the right when the light source moves to the right.
Size of the postcard's shadow will remain the same.
Summary: Shadows of all objects will move to the right and remain the same size.
